drain_message: CURSED LAND, CURSED MAN, CURSED MIND.
I AM BEING WATCHED... FROM WHERE? FROM WHAT?
I AM LATE FOR MY DESTINY.
LIFE IS FLEETING, BUT WHAT YET STAYS?
RAIN OF BLOOD. REIGN OF BLOOD.
THE GATES OF THE MANSUS IS HERE, IS OPEN.
THE HIGHER I RISE, THE MORE I SEE.
THEIR HAND IS AT MY SIDE.
examine: What did I see on the other side?
I feel a hand at my throat.
I weep, yet no tears fall.
Is this the end? Or the beginning?
What's out there? What's through there?
Is this what we are? Is this what we can be?
We don't deserve this... do we?
We thought we were predators, but we are prey.
